translations: n.有效性：指事物或行动产生预期结果的能力。
· The effectualness of the new policy has been proven by the positive results.
新政策的有效性已经通过积极的结果得到证实。

sentences.sentence: Total effectualness rate was 92.9%, the patients of lower age tending to have better outcomes(P<0.05).
sentences.translation: 治疗总有效率为92.9%。疗效满意组平均年龄小于疗效不满意组（P<0.05）。
